channel.title: [3ds] Flail
channel.description:
Like i said before, im new to 3ds so i am not very good at all. Im only posting here for genuine feedback on how to improve. I know i messed up on the chrome, i'll fix it in V2
[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2cnf3fd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/az8ex1.jpg[/img]''
Feedback on what will make it look better besides textures?

item.title: [3ds] Flail
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

The spikes are to steep in my opinion. Hit the wall and the spikes break off. Look at this image: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Klassischer-Flegel.jpg You can see that the spikes aren’t that steep. They don’t have to be, because the power will do the job so it doesn’t have to cut into the enemy.

Read full topic
